00039 
00040 #include "navigation_trajectory_planner/Stopwatch.h"
00041 
00042 Stopwatch::Stopwatch() {
00043     elapsedTime = 0;
00044     isPause = false;
00045 }
00046 
00047 Stopwatch::Stopwatch(const Stopwatch& orig) {
00048     isPause = orig.isPause;
00049     elapsedTime = orig.elapsedTime;
00050     startTime = orig.startTime;
00051     stopTime = orig.stopTime;
00052 }
00053 
00054 Stopwatch::~Stopwatch() {
00055 }
00056 
00057 void Stopwatch::start() {
00058     isPause = false;
00059     clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, &startTime);
00060 }
00061 
00062 void Stopwatch::stop() {
00063     isPause = false;
00064     elapsedTime = 0;
00065     clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, &stopTime);
00066 }
00067 
00068 void Stopwatch::pause() {
00069     if (!isPause) {
00070         isPause = true;
00071         clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, &stopTime);
00072         elapsedTime = getElapsedTime();
00073     }
00074 }
00075 
00076 double Stopwatch::convertToMs(const timespec& time) const {
00077     return (time.tv_sec * 1000000000 + time.tv_nsec) / 1000000.0;
00078 }
00079 
00080 double Stopwatch::getStartTime() const {
00081     return convertToMs(startTime);
00082 }
00083 
00084 double Stopwatch::getStopTime() const {
00085     return convertToMs(stopTime);
00086 }
00087 
00088 double Stopwatch::getElapsedTime() const {
00089     return elapsedTime + convertToMs(stopTime) - convertToMs(startTime);
00090 }
